products.name: Baby Diaper Pack
products.description: Soft and absorbent diapers to keep your baby dry and comfortable
products.usage: Change diaper every 2-3 hours or as needed
products.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: Baby Shampoo
products.description: Gentle shampoo for sensitive baby skin and hair
products.composition: Mild cleansing agents, No tears formula
products.usage: Apply small amount on wet hair, lather, rinse thoroughly

products.name: Baby Lotion
products.description: Keeps baby's skin soft and hydrated all day
products.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Mineral oil, Aloe vera extract
products.usage: Apply to clean skin, massage gently until absorbed
products.storage: Store in a cool dry place, avoid eye contact

products.name: Baby Wipes
products.description: Soft and gentle wipes for delicate baby skin
products.usage: Use to clean baby's skin as needed
products.storage: Keep pack sealed to prevent drying

products.name: Multivitamin
products.description: Daily multivitamins to support growth, immunity, and overall development of your baby
products.composition: Vitamins A, B, C, D, E, Minerals
products.ingredients: Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Calcium, Iron, Zinc
products.usage: Give as directed by your pediatrician
products.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: L-Methylfolate
products.description: L-Methylfolate supplement for proper brain development and red blood cell formation
products.usage: Give once daily as directed by a pediatrician
products.storage: Keep in a cool dry place away from sunlight

products.name: Baby Syrup
products.description: Natural homeopathic tonic to boost appetite, digestion, and energy levels in babies
products.usage: 2-3 ml twice daily or as prescribed by your pediatrician
products.storage: Store below 25°C, keep away from direct sunlight

products.name: Baby Soap
products.description: Gentle cleansing soap for delicate baby skin, keeping it soft, smooth, and moisturized
products.usage: Lather gently on baby's skin and rinse thoroughly
